metadata.title: ATM Tie Dye Poncho Caftan Kaftan Tunic Blouse Cover Up Handmade Plus Size
features: Free size fit for US size 1X to 4X

DRESS UP : Utility of these summer casual blouse. You can dress them up in many occasion such as walk in the garden , shopping at supermarket or wear them as swimsuit cover up and experience quickly drying rayon in action.
COMFORTABLE : You will have fun in the sun with our beautiful tie dye summer blouse that’s comfortably lightweight and soft to complement the beautiful weather.
GREAT FIT : Whether you’re beautifully big or small shape. you’ll find a great-fitting from our range of six sizes. The lovely drape and loose comfortable fit complements just about any body shape.
UNIQUELY : This blouse come in hand tie dye that made from one-by-one. So you will have dress up in unique.
description: Perfect for this spring and summer !!
Blouse Caftan/Kaftan Poncho style. It has V-neck and fringes at bottom hem. This blouse made from tie dye by handmade.
Comfortable for wearing. Many usages for all occasion such as beaches, relaxation and outdoor
Comfortable for wearing. Many usages for all occasion such as beaches, relaxation and outdoor
The fine art print in each dress will be vary and slightly different according to handmade tie dye.
The fine art print in each dress will be vary and slightly different according to handmade tie dye.
Separate wash is recommended. For first time wash, some color may be a little bit discoloration because of tie dye process but they will be non-fade color in the next time.
Separate wash is recommended. For first time wash, some color may be a little bit discoloration because of tie dye process but they will be non-fade color in the next time.
Bust : 70 inches / 180 cm Waist : 70 inches / 180 cm Hip : 70 inches / 180 cm Armhole : 18 inches / 46 cm Length : 32 inches / 82 cm (with fringe)
There may be 1-2 inches deviation in different size depend on fabric shrinkage.
